alert.note: Alert for Gloucester; Salem (New Jersey) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly (New Jersey, Delaware, Southeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 12 at 5:46PM EDT by NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern New Castle, northwestern Salem and west central Gloucester Counties through 630 PM EDT... At 546 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Penns Grove, or over Wilmington, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Wilmington, Pennsville, Carneys Point, Elsmere, New Castle, Penns Grove, Salem, Woodstown, Alloway, Quinton, Swedesboro, Newport, Arden, Beckett, Delaware Memorial Bridge, Wilmington Manor, Marcus Hook, Bellefonte, Ardentown and Ardencroft. This includes the following highways... New Jersey Turnpike near exit 1. Interstate 95 in Pennsylvania near mile marker 0. Interstate 95 in Delaware between mile markers 11 and 23. Interstate 295 in New Jersey between mile markers 0 and 11. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
